title: Subchapter D - REAL PROPERTY AND LAND ACQUISITION
content:
Subchapter D - REAL PROPERTY AND LAND ACQUISITION
State Regulations

Part 590 - PAYMENT OF EXPENSES UPON ACQUISITION OF REAL PROPERTY (ยง 590.1 to 590.12)

Part 591 - Procedures For The Selection, Review, Approval And Funding Of State Projects Under The 1986 Environmental Quality Bond Act (ยง 591.1 to 591.9)

Part 592 - Procedure for the modification or extinguishment of a conservation easement held by the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation (ยง 592.1 to 592.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
